body_html: Related, in the discussion #6271 they talk about height and width in that order without raising an eyebrow, so I think we're the ones confused about the (x,y)-convention 😄. I don't think this is a bug then, just a strange convention so I propose closing issue.
body_text: Related, in the discussion #6271 they talk about height and width in that order without raising an eyebrow, so I think we're the ones confused about the (x,y)-convention 😄. I don't think this is a bug then, just a strange convention so I propose closing issue.
body: Related, in the discussion #6271 they talk about height and width in that order without raising an eyebrow, so I think we're the ones confused about the (x,y)-[convention](https://highresolutions.com/blog/2010/03/what-comes-first-width-or-height/) 😄. I don't think this is a bug then, just a strange convention so I propose closing issue.
